Introduction:
The use of medical cannabis has been a subject of intense debate across societies worldwide. This essay aims to delve into the ongoing debate surrounding the use of medical cannabis, considering the perspectives of both opponents and supporters. Additionally, it will assess the potential benefits and drawbacks of legalization, drawing on evidence from studies and experiences in other
